commits.message:
cleaned up graph creation with neo4j

removed clunky MATCH WHERE clauses and replaced with MERGE
created an index for each node label for faster graph traversals

Merge pull request #5 from amr-amr/graphdb

Graphdb

removed clunky MATCH WHERE clauses and replaced with MERGE
created an index for each node label for faster graph traversals

pre-submission hacks
exploring redis as a tool to load data faster

issue.title: Soft matching of Authors and Topics
issue.body: We could use the `whoosh` search library to improve searching capabilities for authors as we do in titles/abstracts right now

commits.message:
Renamed explore, recommend to search, library

Also css changes.

polishing exploration feed
